rukus.text: 82|5|tab pratyek praanee ko gyaan ho jaayega, jo usane kiya hai aur nahin kiya hai.
82|6|he insaan! tujhe kis vastu ne tere udaar paalanahaar se bahaka diya
82|7|jisane teree rachana kee, phir tujhe santulit banaaya.
82|9|vaastav mein tum pratiphal (pralay) ke din ko nahin maanate.
82|12|ve jo kuchh tum karate ho, jaanate hain.
82|15|pratikaar (badale) ke din usamen jhonk diye jaayenge.
82|16|aur ve usase bach rahane vaale nahin.
82|17|aur tum kya jaano ki badale ka din kya hai
82|18|phir tum kya jaano ki badale ka din kya hai
82|19|jis din kisee ka kisee ke lie koee adhikaar nahin hoga aur us din sab adhikaar allaah ka hoga.
